_description: The Kyng and the Hermit — in l2-line stanzas (aabccbddbeeb)

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Ihesu þat is heuyn kyngIff þem All god endyngIf it
                    be þi wyllAnd ȝif þem parte of heuen
                    game…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…The blast of þat horn made hem gladTo þe towne
                    þan gan þi fare
